name: EXHEART
description:
A story of 6 characters (Including the MC)

making a game after the disaster of Sword Art Online

This story takes place in 2028 

6 years after SAO (I think)

I have only finished Chapter 1 so far

it's a work in progress

Chapter 1 has both English and Japanese translations Spanish coming soon

Credits for music and art are in the files

all characters have full descriptions

which you can get at our discord server, where I accept feedback and suggestions

and I can give everyone more details about the game and its progress.

https://discord.gg/zxYHBuYgZH
